entities.name: INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE
entities.description: The Internal Revenue Service (IRS) is a U.S. government agency responsible for tax collection and tax law enforcement.

entities.name: DELOITTE & TOUCHE LLP
entities.description: Deloitte & Touche LLP is a multinational professional services network and one of the Big Four accounting organizations.

entities.name: CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER
entities.description: The Chief Executive Officer (CEO) is the highest-ranking executive in a company, responsible for making major corporate decisions.

entities.name: CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER
entities.description: The Chief Financial Officer (CFO) is a senior executive responsible for managing the financial actions of a company.

relationships.relationship_description: Deloitte & Touche LLP is auditing the company's tax positions, some of which are unresolved with the IRS.
Both the CEO and CFO are involved in evaluating the effectiveness of the company's disclosure controls and procedures.
